title: Hoang Son's Data Blog
text:
WELCOME
    Stepping into the world of data feels like exploring a new universe - full of patterns, surprises, and stories waiting to be told. Let’s enjoy this journey together.
    LET'S GO!

title: About Me
text:
Hi, my name is Hoang Son Lai. As a young professional early in my career, I understand there’s still much to learn - and I’m fully committed to that journey. With a strong academic foundation in finance and current postgraduate study in Business Analytics at Monash University, I’m working hard every day to develop both my technical and professional skills. I’ve gained valuable hands-on experience in finance, insurance, and data analysis, and I’m eager to keep improving through real-world challenges. I may be at the beginning, but I bring energy, adaptability, and a serious willingness to grow into every opportunity.


Education
Monash University | Melbourne, Australia
Master’s degree, Business Analytics | Mar 2025 - Dec 2026
Foreign Trade University | Hanoi, Viet Nam
Bachelor’s degree, Banking and International Finance | Sep 2020 - Aug 2024



Experience
Bao Viet Insurance Company | Hanoi, Viet Nam
Insurance Intern | Oct 2024 - Dec 2024
Shinhan Vietnam Finance Company | Hanoi, Viet Nam
Telesales Representative | May 2024 - Sep 2024
RSM Vietnam Company | Hanoi, Viet Nam
Audit Intern | Jul 2023 - Aug 2023

title: Welcome to My Data Journey
text:
This is the beginning of my blog where I will be sharing my journey into the world of data analysis. I’ll be documenting my learning process, projects I’m working on, and insights I gain along the way.
I’m excited to connect with others in the data community. Let’s learn and grow together!
